title: Tata Motors domestic sales dip 8 pc in June
description: Tata Motors reported an 8% decline in total domestic wholesales to 74,147 units in June, with passenger vehicle sales at 43,624 units. The company anticipates a demand recovery with a strong enquiry pipeline and the upcoming festive season in August. Focus remains on the SUV portfolio, especially Punch and Nexon models, as the industry prepares for growth.
